title: The Serpent
description: A CRIME OF RAGEBy day, he was a pleasant man, someone you might know. By night, he was Tom-Tom, a creature darkness set free to kill. Pretty pregnant women drove Tom-Tom murderously mad.A CRIME OF PASSIONHe attacked in anger: a beautiful actress mutilated, a young nurse savagely beaten, a teenage girl crucified. But he shouted in ecstasy as they died.A CRIME OF MADNESSSandy Block, tough New York homicide cop, vowed to find the crazed killer. But time was against him. For someone was out there in the shadows, stalking his newly pregnant wife. And as the hot summer sun set with a sinister hiss, the evil sidled closer, smiling, serpentine, ready to strikeâ€”again.
author: David Wiltse
